thread.title: Sepp Blatter's lawyer says FIFA president 'will not resign' despite calls from major sponsors
thread.title_full: Sepp Blatter's lawyer says FIFA president 'will not resign' despite calls from major sponsors

title: Sepp Blatter's lawyer says FIFA president 'will not resign' despite calls from major sponsors
text: Updated: 3:08 p.m. Friday, Oct. 2, 2015 | Posted: 3:08 p.m. Friday, Oct. 2, 2015 Sepp Blatter's lawyer says FIFA president 'will not resign' despite calls from major sponsors ï»¿ View Larger FIFA President Sepp Blatter drives his car into the garage of the FIFA headquarters on his way to work in Zurich, Switzerland, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. Blatter was questioned by Swiss investigators on Friday about why FIFA paid 2 million Swiss francs (about $2 million) to UEFA President Michel Platini in 2011 for work supposedly carried out at least nine years earlier. (AP Photo/Michael Probst) View Larger FIFA-President Sepp Blatter sits in an office of the FIFA headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. Blatter told his staff on Monday he has done "nothing illegal or improper" and has no immediate plans to step down. (AP Photo/Michael Probst) Sponsored Links
